header.description: I am a full-stack software developer graduated from 4Geeks Academy, working mainly with React.JS and Python Flask, after years of professional experience in graphic design. I consider that I am self-critical when evaluating my work and that teamwork provides more value than individual work. I am looking for a stable work environment that allows me to add value and continue learning.

header.traveland: Web application to connect people through the creation of travel routes in which they can travel together.
